detail_desc: 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly organic.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details in a looser fit with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly organic.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a print motif front and back. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, diagonal side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Visible, gathered seams down the sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a print motif front and back. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip down the front, diagonal side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Visible, gathered seams down the sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short dressing gown in satin with a wrapover front, ties at the sides, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.
Pouch bag in transparent plastic with decorative plastic shells. Zip with a tab at the top. Height 21 cm. Length 28 cm.
Smartphone case in frosted, semi-transparent plastic.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Fake back pockets with a flap, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a bellows pleat.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly. Fake back pockets with a flap, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a bellows pleat.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Short dress in patterned mesh with long sleeves, a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties at one side. Partly lined.

Angular sunglasses with concealed frames and slim sidepieces in metal. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Waist bag in woven fabric with an embroidered text motif. One large compartment with a concealed zip at the front and one zipped compartment at the back. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth approx. 5 cm. Height approx. 16 cm. Width approx. 28 cm.

Waist bag in woven fabric with an embroidered text motif. One large compartment with a concealed zip at the front and one zipped compartment at the back. Adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Depth approx. 5 cm. Height approx. 16 cm. Width approx. 28 cm.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with twisted seams and contrasting colour mesh sections at the sides. Round neck with a narrow trim, and short raglan sleeves.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Track jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar, hood, kangaroo pockets and a contrasting colour zip down the front with a chin guard.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and high cut at the back.

Waist bag in cotton canvas with a text print on the front and a double-ended zip at the top with canvas tabs. Zipped compartment at the back, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Height 15.5 cm. Width 26.6 cm. Depth 5 cm.

Waist bag in cotton canvas with a text print on the front and a double-ended zip at the top with canvas tabs. Zipped compartment at the back, one inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Height 15.5 cm. Width 26.6 cm. Depth 5 cm.

Short dress in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Short, raglan puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam at the waist with a narrow drawstring that ties at the back. Lined.

Cargo trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with press-studs and bellows pockets on the legs with a flap and press-studs. Elastic drawstrings with plastic cord locks at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Cargo trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with press-studs and bellows pockets on the legs with a flap and press-studs. Elastic drawstrings with plastic cord locks at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Elastic drawstrings with plastic cord locks at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button and covered elastication at the hems. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with press-studs. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer set is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.

Patterned microfibre tights with an elasticated waist.
Base layer tights in soft, patterned wool jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved base layer top in soft, patterned wool jersey. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Block-coloured top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, stand-up collar, zip at the top, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
Leather sandals with jute-covered wedge heels, heel caps in woven fabric and a narrow, adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 9 cm.

Suede ankle boots with pointed toes. Satin linings and leather insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Cap in imitation leather with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and diagonal side pockets.

A-line maxi dress in an airy patterned weave. Narrow cut at the top with a V-shaped opening and small frilled collar with a decorative drawstring and long ties at the front. Gathered seam at the knees for added width. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Ankle-length sports joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket, all with a concealed zip. Ventilating mesh section at the crotch. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Ankle-length sports joggers in jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket, all with a concealed zip. Ventilating mesh section at the crotch. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Long dress in airy weave with a sweetheart neckline and draped, wrapover bodice with a concealed silicone trim at the top and support panels. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, a seam under the bust, and a long, wide skirt. Satin lining.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet and a calf-height shaft with reflective details. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.

All-in-one suit in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Kangaroo pockets, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the all-in-one suit is organic.
Dresses in airy cotton jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Pyjama bottoms in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and wide, straight legs with lace-trimmed hems.
Nursing top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, short sleeves and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
